author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Alien television series Alien: Earth officially brought the sci-fi horror franchise to the small screen. Now that the first season has concluded, showrunner Noah Hawley has opened up about the show’s ending, while also addressing the potential plans for Alien: Earth Season 2. For those who watched the season finale of Alien: Earth Season [...]

title: ‘Alien: Earth’ Showrunner Teases Potential Season 2 Plans

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The release of The Acolyte introduced one of the most divisive Star Wars projects to date. The live-action Disney Plus series faced backlash and criticism from fans and, while there were supporters of the show, Disney ultimately had the series axed. As such, it comes as a surprise that The Acolyte star Jodie Turner-Smith is [...]

title: ‘The Acolyte’ Star Jodie Turner-Smith Returns To Star Wars
